Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface StudentContainerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Jsonable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BoundedStudentContainer, Cloud, Hall, Jester, PriestAndPrincess, StudentContainer, StudentStoreCharacter, StudentStoreCharacterTest.MockCharacter
interface StudentContainerInterface extends Jsonable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StudentContainerInterface
    add(Student s)
    This method allows to add a Student to the container, and returns a copy of the container containing that student.
    Set<Student>
    getStudents()
    It returns a Set containing all the Students inside the container.
    Tuple<? extends StudentContainerInterface,Student>
    remove()
    This method removes a random Student from the container, and returns it with a new container instance, not containing the removed student.
    Tuple<? extends StudentContainerInterface,Student>
    remove(PieceColor color)
    This method removes a Student of the given PieceColor from the container, and returns it with a new container instance, not including the removed student.
    int
    size()
    It returns the total number of Students inside the Container.
    int
    size(PieceColor color)
    It returns the number of Students of a certain color inside the container.

  • Method Details

    • size

      int size()
      It returns the total number of Students inside the Container.
      Returns:
      the number of Students inside the Container

    • size

      int size(PieceColor color)
      It returns the number of Students of a certain color inside the container.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the Students
      Returns:
      the number of Students of that color inside the container

    • getStudents

      Set<Student> getStudents()
      It returns a Set containing all the Students inside the container.
      Returns:
      the Set<Student> containing all the Students of the container

    • add

      StudentContainerInterface add(Student s) throws IllegalArgumentException, ContainerIsFullException, ColorIsFullException
      This method allows to add a Student to the container, and returns a copy of the container containing that student.
      Parameters:
      s - the student to add
      Returns:
      the new container instance including the new student
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student to add is null
      ContainerIsFullException - if the container is already full (if there is a bound to the number of students)
      ColorIsFullException - if there are too many students of this color inside the container (if there is a bound to the number of students of the same color)

    • remove

      Tuple<? extends StudentContainerInterface,Student> remove() throws EmptyContainerException
      This method removes a random Student from the container, and returns it with a new container instance, not containing the removed student.
      Returns:
      A Tuple<Container, Student> with the new container instance and the removed student
      Throws:
      EmptyContainerException - if the container is empty

    • remove

      Tuple<? extends StudentContainerInterface,Student> remove(PieceColor color) throws IllegalArgumentException, EmptyStackException
      This method removes a Student of the given PieceColor from the container, and returns it with a new container instance, not including the removed student.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to remove
      Returns:
      A Tuple<Container, Student> with the new container instance and the removed student
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the color passed is null
      EmptyStackException - if there are no students of the specified color in the container

    • toJson

      default com.google.gson.JsonElement toJson()
      Creates and return a new JsonElement corresponding to this object
      Specified by:
      toJson in interface Jsonable
      Returns:
      a JsonElement corresponding to this object
